website_summaries.verdict: Thoughtfully designed, these waders are loaded with features that give them a custom feel. But you'll see the difference in the price tag, too.
pros: Suspender design allows for quick high waist conversion
Belt loop designed to work with gear bags
cons: Does not include waterproof chest pouch - if you want this feature it must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these more and more each time I wear them. I am 6'4" and they fit great. Built in rock gards are a plus. Wish it came with the inner pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Gonder

customer_reviews.title: Like these waders
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these waders. Took them to Alaska & they worked much better than others that I had gotten
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable waders.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the fact that you need to buy an inside chest pouch separately. Wish it was included. Like the waders. Very comfortable. Fit as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: This product fit like it was custom made. I have bought waders which where half the price; they fit poorly and leaked ...you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: prchjrk

customer_reviews.title: Elastic belt is a no go
customer_reviews.text: Not going in a river with a belt other than a solid web strap belt. The lighter weight and elastic belt can be dangerous in the case of a full on dunking. Otherwise looked good...but sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Went in the pouring down rain in N. Ga and they worked like a dream. Comfortable, breathable, and affordable. SIMMS is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Drew May

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, room for thermals if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine. Will be great for strem fishing in summer due to light weight.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: They are a little larger than expected, but overall, a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Quality waders
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Have used it twice for Surf fishing in Northern California.
customer_reviews.author: cowens677

customer_reviews.title: Great for fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father-in-law because he goes fishing every weekend and he loves it. He wanted new waders after his first ones got a hole. He says it fits him well and he has had no issues with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: These waders will keep you dry
customer_reviews.text: Waders are working out great. Using them for steelhead fishing in the Erie PA tributaries
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Lightweight but super effective. So much better than our old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: These are for Christmas for my son. I hope he likes them
customer_reviews.author: Susan de Boer

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: typical great simms quality light weight wish the feet were a bit smaller but for what it is I can’t complain best price out there for a simms wader
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fritze

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: I put these on and felt like an absolute god. 10/10. Would recommend to anyone. Incredible. Amazing. My jaw drop. Just so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Shevchuk

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed at the quality so far, may be a return customer!
customer_reviews.text: i used it once, seems pretty well made. hope it lasts the beating i'm going to give it this year!
customer_reviews.author: Frank the tank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! You get what you pay for and these waders are awesome quality for the money. The other wader options on Amazon are cheap and unreliable. Not Simms! Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: G. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I fish a lot and bought these and they held up great when I first bought them in March. Fished all spring summer and fall and Started leaking around November of the same year. Better to purchase a cheaper $60 pair and have them last just as long
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: "front zippered top stash pocket for keeping tools and fly boxes within close range."
customer_reviews.text: "front zippered top stash pocket for keeping tools and fly boxes within close range." Not waterProof
customer_reviews.author: iCho

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and not durable
customer_reviews.text: These waders didn’t make it long. Both of the booties started leaking after only a month or two of use where I had to repair them. Now there is a leak in one of the seams and I can’t stay dry. Very disappointed as it has only been 1 season and they are useless
customer_reviews.author: Ian

product_meta.title: Simms Mens Tributary Stockingfoot Waterproof Waders
feature_bullets: DESIGN – Our Mens Tributary Stockingfoot wader offers a breathable and waterproof 3-Layer upper and 4-Layer lower. Built with proven Simms durability, these dry, breathable fly fishing chest waders promote natural mobility while you negotiate steep trails and deep rivers

PERFORMANCE – Great for any season. Suspenders and opposing male and female buckles allow a quick waist high conversion for the warm days on the water. Plus a reach-through fleece lined hand warmer pocket for trips in the cold season

UTILITY AND CONVENIENT – Anatomically engineered neoprene stockingfeet with anti-microbial finish. Equipped with two belt loops with 38 mm nylon waist belt, a reach-through fleece-lined hand warmer pocket, and a front zippered top stash pocket for keeping tools and fly boxes within close range. Tributary waders come ready to accept a Simms Tippet Tender Pocket or Waterproof Wader Pouch both of which are sold separately.

COMFORT – Stay active, stay comfortable – why compromise? Fishing waders come with a self-fabric gravel guard and gathered elastic bottom hem - designed to prevent aversion on the inner legs and improve articulation and mobility

THE SIMMS WADER WARRANTY: If your wader leaks in the first 60 days of ownership, you may return it to Simms for a replacement of the same model and size. If your wader leaks within the first year of ownership, we’ll repair Simms will repair it at no charge. If your wader is in need of repair after your first year of ownership, Simms charges a flat fee of $60 for evaluation, repair, testing of repairs and return shipping back to you
